name: Wolf
description: A medium-sized predator found in forests, mountains, and tundras, known for its sharp teeth and claws and pack mentality.
memorable: Wolves are apex predators, skilled hunters that coordinate attacks using their pack tactics.
goals: To hunt larger prey and defend their territory.
relations: Often found in packs, they may be accompanied by other wolves.
environment: Typically inhabits forests, mountains, and tundras.
strengths: Excellent stealth and perception, making them dangerous in ambush situations.
weaknesses: Relatively low intelligence and low-hit points.
attacks: Bitten attacks that deal 5 piercing damage and have a chance to knock the target prone.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics allows advantage on attack rolls against targets near allies.
senses: Heightened senses grant advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on hearing and smell.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, making them adept at detecting threats and avoiding danger.
additional_information: Known for their communication through howls and vocalizations.
Prefer to avoid humans unless threatened or food is scarce.
Can deliver significant damage in packs during encounters.
Respected and feared by all creatures within their range.
Capable of delivering a solid threat in both solitary and group settings.
